Attacks all adjacent targets with added magic damage
+1 Maximum Target for every +1 Combat Power

Enhances arrows to track your target, homing in on your enemies fear
Unleashes waves of frozen arrows from the sky in a large targeted area
Greatly increases attack rating and damage at the expense of movement and attack speed
Greatly increases movement and attack speed at the expense of defense and attack rating
Greatly increases attack damage at the expense of weapon durability

Chance to lose durability reduced by 8%
Illuminates nearby enemies and exposes their weak points
Enemy Physical Resist (or Immunity) reduced by 20%
Attack with a series of rapid thrusts using a javelin, spear or polearm
Turns your javelin into a bolt of lightning that splits and pierces enemies on impact

+1 Charged Bolt for every +1 Spell Power

Magically splits one arrow into many, unleashing an arc of quivers at your enemies
